name: What's there?
description:
VR game made for the Oculus Rift.

Guessing game where you as the player conduct experiments on different objects using tools and furniture to draw conclusions. The player only sees the bounding box, the spectators see the actual object. When a guess has been made, the object is revealed to the player.

Made by: Jakub Svehla, Michail Nenkov, Rasmus Nordling in Copenhagen during Nordic Game Jam 2017.

Gameplay video.
